result.reason: Environment-specific crash on start from Program Files, likely UAC/permissions issue — user found workaround installing to C:\Tools, no crash logs or .NET errors available to diagnose further
result.approach: Request crash logs or Windows Event Viewer .NET errors; likely a UAC write-permission issue when app tries to write config to its install directory under Program Files

attempts.raw_output:
Based on the issue details: the user reports mRemoteNG crashes immediately on start from `Program Files` but works from `C:\Tools`. Comments suggest UAC/permissions issue with the `Program Files` folder. No crash logs or .NET errors were found. The issue is from 2020, labeled "Support Request", and the user found their own workaround.
